Indented text blocks are rendered as blockquotes
.
Paragraph text

    This is a blockquote.
    It can span multiple lines.
.
<p>Paragraph text</p>
<blockquote>
<p>This is a blockquote.
It can span multiple lines.</p>
</blockquote>
.

Block quotes may be separated by an unindented line.
.
Paragraph text

    This is the first blockquote.

    This is the second blockquote.

Paragraph text
.
<p>Paragraph text</p>
<blockquote>
<p>This is the first blockquote.</p>
</blockquote>
<blockquote>
<p>This is the second blockquote.</p>
</blockquote>
<p>Paragraph text</p>
.

Quotes indented by 8 or more spaces (or tab equivalent) are rendered with a depth indicator.
.
Paragraph text

    This is a blockquote that quotes someone else:

        This is a nested blockquote.

		This is a second nested blockquote.

    Then the first blockquote continues.

Paragraph text
.
<p>Paragraph text</p>
<blockquote>
<p>This is a blockquote that quotes someone else:</p>
</blockquote>
<blockquote class="indent-2">
<p>This is a nested blockquote.</p>
</blockquote>
<blockquote class="indent-2">
<p>This is a second nested blockquote.</p>
</blockquote>
<blockquote>
<p>Then the first blockquote continues.</p>
</blockquote>
<p>Paragraph text</p>
.

Indented quotes joined by indented lines are rendered as part of the same blockquote.
.
Paragraph text

    This is a blockquote that quotes someone else:
    
        This is a nested blockquote.
    
    Then the first blockquote continues.

Paragraph text
.
<p>Paragraph text</p>
<blockquote>
<p>This is a blockquote that quotes someone else:</p>
<blockquote>
<p>This is a nested blockquote.</p>
</blockquote>
<p>Then the first blockquote continues.</p>
</blockquote>
<p>Paragraph text</p>
.

Text indents are normalized to four spaces
.
Paragraph text

 Paragraph text

  Paragraph text

   Paragraph text

    Blockquote text

     Blockquote text

      Blockquote text

       Blockquote text

        Nested blockquote
.
<p>Paragraph text</p>
<p>Paragraph text</p>
<p>Paragraph text</p>
<p>Paragraph text</p>
<blockquote>
<p>Blockquote text</p>
</blockquote>
<blockquote>
<p>Blockquote text</p>
</blockquote>
<blockquote>
<p>Blockquote text</p>
</blockquote>
<blockquote>
<p>Blockquote text</p>
</blockquote>
<blockquote class="indent-2">
<p>Nested blockquote</p>
</blockquote>
.

Nested blockquotes must be indented four spaces beyond the indent of the parent, not just simple multiples of four.
.
Paragraph text.

      Blockquote text indented at 6 spaces.
      
        Second paragraph of blockquote text indented at 8 spaces.
          
          This is a nested blockquote.
.
<p>Paragraph text.</p>
<blockquote>
<p>Blockquote text indented at 6 spaces.</p>
<p>Second paragraph of blockquote text indented at 8 spaces.</p>
<blockquote>
<p>This is a nested blockquote.</p>
</blockquote>
</blockquote>
.

Escapes, html entities, and inline markers function within quotes
.
text with **inlines**, \[backslash escapes\], typography(tm), "smart quotes", character references (&#x1f600;) &amp;&nbsp;entities.

    text with **inlines**, \[backslash escapes\], typography(tm), "smart quotes", character references (&#x1f600;) &amp;&nbsp;entities.
.

<blockquote>
<p>text with <strong>inlines</strong>, [backslash escapes], typography‚Ñ¢, ‚Äúsmart quotes‚Äù, character references (üòÄ) &amp;¬†entities.</p>

.

Thematic breaks and headings should be rendered within indented quotes
.
    * * *

    ---

    # ATX Heading

    SEText Heading
    --------------
.
<blockquote><hr /></blockquote>
<blockquote><hr /></blockquote>
<blockquote><h1>ATX Heading</h1></blockquote>
<blockquote><h2>SEText Heading</h2></blockquote>
.

Indented quotes separated by blank indented lines (spaces or tabs) are part of the same block quote.
.
    chunk1
    
      chunk2
.
<blockquote>
<p>chunk1</p>
<p>chunk2</p>
</blockquote>
.

Indented quotes are rendered as `q.blockquote` elements when not separated from the previous paragraph.
.
Foo
    bar
.
<p>Foo
<q class="blockquote">bar</q></p>
.

Indented quotes are rendered as `q.blockquote` elements when not separated from the subsequent paragraph.
.
    foo
bar
.
<p><q class="blockquote">foo</q>
bar</p>
.

Indented quotes are rendered as `q.blockquote` elements when they are inside a paragraph with no separation.
.
Paragraph text:
    Indented quote.
more paragraph text.
.
<p>Paragraph text:
<q class="blockquote">Indented quote.</q>
more paragraph text.</p>
.

Blank indented lines around a quote within a paragraph are not rendered.
.
Paragraph text:
    
    Indented quote.
    
more paragraph text.
.
<p>Paragraph text:
<q class="blockquote">Indented quote.</q>
more paragraph text.</p>
.

Multiple blockquote paragraphs can be separated by blank indented lines
.
Paragraph text:
    
    Indented quote paragraph.
    
    Second indented quote paragraph.
    
more paragraph text.
.
<p>Paragraph text:
<q class="blockquote">Indented quote paragraph.</q>
<q class="blockquote">Second indented quote paragraph.</q>
more paragraph text.</p>
.

Blank lines around indented quotes are not rendered.
.

    
    foo
    

.
<blockquote>
<p>foo</p>
</blockquote>
.

> The first line can be indented more than four spaces:

Trailing spaces are not rendered in blockquotes.
.
    foo  
.
<blockquote>
<p>foo</p>
</blockquote>
.

Code fences work within indented quotes.
.
    ```
    aaa
    ```
.
<blockquote><pre><code>
aaa
</code></pre></blockquote>
.
